name: LOKAM Dating Sim
description:
In the dawn of time, there was only one thing to look forward to in life: romance. Where did I pull that fact from? Out of my ass, of course- but that isn't the point. The point is- love is pretty fuckin' cool, and has been around for the forevers.

Anyway, since Valentines Day NEVER gets any romance games, why not have a dating sim for this particular day of celebrating said romances? Oh wait, the game wasn't released on Valentine's Day? This ruins everything. BUT WHO CARES!!!! IT IS A DATING SIM that has 3 DIFFERENT GIRLS (one of them is a dude) CALLED LOKAMS!!!

You might ask, what is a LOKAM? Ha! What a stupid question! Moving on!

Play as a cool person who is in the spirit of... romanceful love! Flirt with the loves of your dreams, which are (un)coincidentally LOKAM!!! LOKAMS!!! LOKAMES???

Do you have what it takes to be the ULTIMATE LOVER? Or are you just some BRAINDEAD LOSER who SITS AND PLAYS WEIRD ASS INDIE GAMES ALL DAY? YOU PROBABLY MIGHT BE BOTH!

Have fun.

  • Programming, Writing, and Misc. art by Konami Kode
  • Art by SpaghettiiWithJuice
  • Music by about-blank
  • Logos, Banners, Misc. by Liaxao
